how-to-implement: in your meta.json - define *extended* with url to this (json) file - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cardanians/adapools.org/master/example-meta.json

about.me: Our company runs Muen-project, a planning company that provides outsourced pharmacist services, SPO, underwater photography, guesthouse management advisory services, and outdoor store management.医療関連業務や海、山などのアウトドア関連サービスに加えてNFThubs、Cardanoステーキングプール運営に努めておりますので、委任の際はぜひMUENをご検討いただければ幸いです。：）
